name: Galactic Incoming
description:
We all love a classic shoot-em-up game. Well, here's one for you, Retro Style.

Shoot those Aliens with all that you got, but don't go too crazy. Watch out for your fuel level. If you run out of fuel, game over!

Build up your Bonus as you shoot, random bonus awarded as your Bonus hits max.

Those eyeball aliens will strike you and present a strike counter. If the strike counter gets to one, next strike, life gone.

Mystery triangle hit is awarded by more Bonus points.

Random teleport-ed Aliens will appear at intervals, so watch out!

If you manage to get past Level 14, you're gifted!

Enjoy and Good luck.
